Issue.creator: manish-sethi
Issue.summary: CR https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/18411/ does not work in vagrant env
Issue.description: The CR https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/18411/ has an issue when executing the byfn script with -p flag. It does not allow docker containers to start because of filesystem mount issue in the vagrant folder.
